img_above_text:
![Wukong Lanxi 4.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/6f/Wukong_Lanxi_4.jpg)
Down will drop a Puppet Spider, a Yaoguai that likes to ambush and stab at you with its many legs. Luckily, you'll have Zhu Bajie on your side once more, and overwhelming lone opponents will be an easy task. They can spew poison from a distance, so watch yourself that you don't have to waste any Antimiasma potions this early.
img_below_text:
As you approach the entrance to the village, you can spot two paths - a main one directly ahead, and a side path leading to the left down some stairs. You can also check out a small stream to the right with more plants to harvest in and around the water, and a green Wisp to absorb (it's guarded by another Puppet Spider).
In fact, this town is teeming with green Wisps of all sizes, which means you'll have a lot of these little spirits to absorb to gain both will and some of your Gourd charges back in a pinch.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Lanxi 4.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/6f/Wukong_Lanxi_4.jpg)
Down will drop a Puppet Spider, a Yaoguai that likes to ambush and stab at you with its many legs. Luckily, you'll have Zhu Bajie on your side once more, and overwhelming lone opponents will be an easy task. They can spew poison from a distance, so watch yourself that you don't have to waste any Antimiasma potions this early."
        - Following Text: "As you approach the entrance to the village, you can spot two paths - a main one directly ahead, and a side path leading to the left down some stairs. You can also check out a small stream to the right with more plants to harvest in and around the water, and a green Wisp to absorb (it's guarded by another Puppet Spider).
In fact, this town is teeming with green Wisps of all sizes, which means you'll have a lot of these little spirits to absorb to gain both will and some of your Gourd charges back in a pinch."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, where the player character, armed with a fiery staff, is exploring a lush, dimly lit area near a stream and a stone-walled village. The "Gather" prompt indicates the player can collect resources, likely the glowing mushrooms in the foreground. A red-dotted marker highlights a distant point of interest, possibly a green Wisp guarded by a Puppet Spider, as mentioned in the text. The setting emphasizes exploration, resource gathering, and potential combat preparation.
